docs.lead_paragraph: Contributions of $4,775.83 were received yesterday for the Hundred Neediest Cases, making a total of $26,240.77 since the appeal was made last Sunday. Nearly $75,000 remains to be raised before last years' total of $111,126 is passed.

headline.main: GIFTS FOR NEEDIEST NOW TOTAL $26,240; Responses to Christmas Appeal Show a Falling Off in Record for the Day. $600 TO BE DIVIDED INTO SIX Largest Contribution, From "L. M.S.," Directed to Go in $100 Lots to the Distributers. SUNDAY SCHOOL CLASS AIDS Mrs. Henry B. Wilson Sends $300 Check, Parts of Which Amount Are for Three Fine Grandmothers.

docs.snippet: Contributions of $4,775.83 were received yesterday for the Hundred Neediest Cases, making a total of $26,240.77 since the appeal was made last Sunday.  Nearly $75,000 remains to be raised before last years' total of $111,126 is passed.

docs.lead_paragraph: Contribuitions of $6,124.38 were received yesterday by The Hundred Neediest Cases. The total since the appeal was made on Sunday is non $21,464.94.

headline.main: $6,124 FOR NEEDY; DAY'S TOTAL DROPS; Times Appeal Has Brought $21,464 to Date--$500 From H.L. Willson. SMALL GIFTS INCREASE Responses Contain Fewer Large Contributions Than on Tuesday. SYMPATHY OF THE AGED Two In Their Eighties Touched by Stories of Hardships--Some Sad Cases Not Remembered Yet.

docs.snippet: Contribuitions of $6,124.38 were received yesterday by The Hundred Neediest Cases. The total since the appeal was made on Sunday is non $21,464.94.
